overview: Helmut has been working as a private investigator in San José for almost ten years. One night he receives a call from his ex-partner: their teenage daughter, Ámbar, is in a coma as a result of a run over. After fifteen years without knowing anything about Ámbar, Helmut discovers unusual circumstances surrounding the supposed traffic accident, which will result in an obsessive investigation that will force him to face his lost fatherhood.
title: Ámbar
